I made this one after years of getting stuck in debates with people about stuff I changed my mind about only a year later, and regretted being so adamant that tabasco is disgusting or whatever. (It’s not, it’s amazing.) 
We’re clearly not going to solve the problems in the centuries ahead with compassion alone. But we could sure end the world without it.
